title: Xayah and Rakan Available Now + Launch Promotions!

replies.body: I've gifted rakan twice(one IP and one RP) and played him twice with a xayah being in my team and havent gotten either of the icons. Did I do something wrong because my friends have both of the icons

>  The icons will be granted within two weeks after the promotion ends.

You won't get either of the Icons immediately, if others got them first then they're lucky
thank you for clarifying. I had left a pretty negative comment which I think riot's deleted XD

I was going to ask a similar question, except I had only gifted Xayah once. And while I paid for the Dusk and Dawn icon and earned the Blazing Feathers icon, I hadn't received the Gift of Magic icon. I'll be waiting for it to arrive within two weeks then, though I hope that it will arrive sooner
If one person get the Cosmic Dusk and Dawn Bundle, can he/she gift one of the champion and skin to other?
No you can't, unfortunately.
If I play Rakan or Xayah solo with someone random in my team will I still earn the icon?

Yes you will!

> Earn a special summoner icon by bringing Xayah and Rakan together on the Rift. To qualify, play two games as Xayah with Rakan on your team, or as Rakan with Xayah on your team. Any completed normal, ranked, or bot game mode will count (custom games excluded).
Even if i play bot game-intro right?
Correct.
Error when gifting Rakan/Xayah? O.o Anyone else or is it just me?
They are currently aware with some issues with the store right now and are looking into it :)
Can someone plz tell me the name of the muic when we are in login page? The song really gets me!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qBJs2uqdQUs
I've played a lot of games with Rakan now with my friend as Xayah but I still don't have the summoner icon{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
It's within 2 weeks of the promotion ending. It ends 27th of April so you might need to wait up until the 11th of May i guess.
I Want to gift the skin and champion bundle but i cant because there is no option to do so, can you make this possible??
Bundle gifting is not currently supported. Sorry about that.
You guys really need to get the bundles into the gifting section...
??? I gifted my friend rakan before this came out. do i still get the icon???
A friend and i gifted each other, i got the blazing feathers icon but yet to receive the gift of magic icon, it was buggy saying we couldnt do it when they were released at first so kinda worried
The different icons are distributed at different times, but if you did send the gift, then the icon should be getting to you soon! Let me know if it's not there by the 24th.
Hey, add me in game for the icon (trade gift) !
If i purchase an IP boost from the store, and use it during the IP boost weekend, Will it work together? or not?
Yup, they'll work together!
Their skin splash art looks a lot like Korthor's artwork from the Leona vs. Diana featured community art from a while back.
FIX this RITO, stop queuing duos with duos please, it's causing confusion and RIOTS...... Q duos with 3 solos to stop people fighting over using these champions. PLEASE
Do you have to gift both Xayah and Rakan or just one to receive the gift?{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}}
Just 1 :)
how long will the gift icon be received?
Within two weeks after the event is completed, but generally sooner.
When are the icons received?
The icons will be granted within two weeks after the promotion ends, but players will generally receive them sooner.
can you gift with rp and still get icon?

> [{quoted}](name=Scrub Jnr,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=aG2Ujj9E,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-19T16:37:02.862+0000)
>
> can you gift with rp and still get icon?

yes
{{champion:498}} {{champion:497}}  <3
